text: Tevha, jya lokanni imana rakhale ani satkarma karita rahile, tyanna tyanca purepura mobadala de'ila, ani apalya krpene anakhi jasta pradana karila, parantu jyanni tiraskara kela ani ghamenda keli tyanna duhkhadayaka siksa-yatana de'ila, maga tyanna allahasivaya apala koni mitra va madata karanara adhalanara nahi
